mapper.select: select c.order_no,review_no, d.detail_no, product_img, product_name from product p, customerOrder_detail d, review r,customer_order c where c.order_no=d.order_no and d.detail_no=r.detail_no and p.product_no=d.product_no and review_code=0 and cust_id=#{cust_id} order by c.order_no desc

select c.order_no,review_no,product_name, review_title, review_content, review_img from review r, customerOrder_detail d, product p,customer_order c where c.order_no=d.order_no and d.detail_no=r.detail_no and d.product_no = p.product_no and review_code=1 and cust_id=#{cust_id} order by review_no desc

select product_img,product_name, review_title, review_content, review_img from review r, customerOrder_detail c, product p where c.detail_no=r.detail_no and c.product_no = p.product_no and review_no=#{review_no}
mapper.update: update review set review_title=#{review_title}, review_content=#{review_content}, review_img=#{review_img}, review_code=#{review_code} where review_no=#{review_no}
mapper.select: select review_title,review_content,review_img,cust_id from review r,customerorder_detail d,customer_order o where r.detail_no = d.detail_no and d.order_no = o.order_no and product_no=#{product_no} and review_code=1 order by review_no desc
